Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh team director Khaled Mahmud Sujon criticized Sri Lanka captain Dasun Shanaka for his comments on Bangladesh's bowling attack, with Sujon retorting 'at least Bangladesh have 2' referring to bowlers Mustafiz and Shakib.
Sujon emphasized the importance of Bangladesh's batting performance, aiming for at least 150-160 runs without losing too many wickets in the powerplay.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Both teams were previously drubbed by Afghanistan, setting the stage for a crucial match.
